data.speaker: Player
data.content: It's the first day of my university life, I am so excited :D

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I am so nervous and I don't know what to do now, my Senpai gave me suggestion what I should do on the first day.

data.speaker: Player
data.content: I remember I wrote it down in the notes, let me check it...

data.speaker: System
data.content:
- Press (E) to open your inventory.
- Find the StickyNotes in the inventory.
- Click the StickyNotes.
